Interface MediaRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MediaRepositoryStub

    public interface MediaRepository
    The interface for the repository.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the Disc, or null if not found.

      • createBook

        boolean createBook(Book b)
        Creates a new book in the repository.
        Parameters:
        b - - the new book.
        Returns:

      • createDisc

        boolean createDisc(Disc disc)

      • updateBook

        boolean updateBook(Book book,
                   java.lang.String isbn)
        Updates an existing book in the repository.
        Parameters:
        book - - book with updated information.
        isbn - - the isbn of an existing book.
        Returns:
        true, if update successful, false otherwise.

      • updateDisc

        boolean updateDisc(Disc disc,
                   java.lang.String barcode)
        Updates an existing disc in the repository.
        Parameters:
        disc - - disc with updated information.
        barcode - - the barcode of an existing disc in the repo.
        Returns:
        true, if update successful, false otherwise.
